alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Lee; Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Elmore, southeastern Lee, northern Bullock, Macon, northern Montgomery and Russell Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Columbus to near Davisville to near Hunter. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Columbus, Prattville, Phenix City, Tuskegee, Hurtsboro, Smiths, Milstead, Pike Road, Smiths Station, Shorter, Franklin, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Lake Tuskegee, Woodcrest, Guerryton, Snowdoun, Waugh and Lagoon Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
